resources.string: SpaceX designs, manufactures and launches advanced rockets and spacecraft. The company was founded in 2002 to revolutionize space technology, with the ultimate goal of enabling people to live on other planets.
The United States Air Force is the aerial warfare service branch of the United States Armed Forces and one of the seven American uniformed services.

The China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation(CASC) is the main contractor for the Chinese space program. It is state-owned and has a number of subordinate entities which design, develop and manufacture a range of spacecraft, Launch vehicles, strategic and tactical missile systems, and ground equipment.

The China National Space Administration (CNSA) is the national space agency of the People\'s Republic of China. It is responsible for the national space program and for planning and development of space activities.

The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO), is the space agency of the Indian government headquartered in the city of Bengaluru. Its vision is to \"harness space technology for national development, while pursuing space science research and planetary exploration\".

"The Russian Aerospace Defence Forces (VKO) was the branch of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation responsible for air and missile defence, and the operation of Russian military satellites and the Plesetsk Cosmodrome. "
The Roscosmos State Corporation for Space Activities, commonly known as Roscosmos, is the governmental body responsible for the Russian space science program and general aerospace research.

United Launch Alliance (ULA) is a joint venture of Lockheed Martin Space Systems and Boeing Defense, Space & Security. ULA was formed in December 2006 by combining the teams at these companies which provide spacecraft Launch services to the government of the United States.
General Dynamics Corporation is an American aerospace and defense company formed by mergers and divestitures. It is the world\'s fifth-largest defense contractor based on 2012 revenues.
Arianespace SA is a French multinational company founded in 1980 as the world\'s first commercial Launch service provider.

The Progress State Research and Production Space Centre, also known as TsSKB-Progress, is a Russian \"Federal State Unitary Enterprise\" under the jurisdiction of Roscosmos, the Russian Federal Space Agency responsible for space science and aerospace research. It is the developer of the famous Soyuz-FG rocket used for manned space flight, as well as Soyuz-U used for launching unmanned probes.
The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) is the United States government agency responsible for the civilian space program as well as aeronautics and aerospace research.

This application, Space Launch Now, started as a simple weekend project. In the course of a year its grown to nearly 10,000 active users. I am incredibly appreciative to everyone that has taken the time to report bugs, give feedback, participate in BETA\'s and become supporters.

Hey there! You seem to like this app, would you mind visiting the Play Store and give a rating? It would help us a great deal! \n\nIf instead you hate this app, we would love to hear your feedback so we can improve. Thanks!
Hey, you seem to like this app. You would help us a great deal with a 5-star rating! Otherwise if you have suggestions - please let us know.

Feel free to submit bugs or feature requests for anything related to the app. If you found an issue with the launch data, the libraries at Launch Library that provide the data can be contacted via Discord or Reddit.
The fastest and most reliable way to get support is through Discord. If thats not an option feel free to email me directly.

This hides launches that have a status of \'no-go\' and can sometimes hide launches that are within their launch window but holding for technical or range issues.
This hides launches that do not have a confirmed launch date or launch time. This can occasionally hide launches that have been scrubbed for the day.
This option will show launches on the home page for up to 24 hours after launch has occurred.
